item.title: Contact
item.description:
Get in Touch

We’d love to hear from you! Whether you have feedback, questions, or just want to chat about Linux, feel free to reach out.

Email

contact@linuxdive.com

We typically respond within 24-48 hours.

What We’re Open To

  • Questions about Linux and distro recommendations
  • Feedback on articles and content
  • Guest contributions or collaboration ideas
  • Bug reports or technical issues with the site

Response Times

Due to the volume of emails, we may not be able to respond to every message, but we read and appreciate all feedback.

item.title: About
item.description:
LinuxDive is an editorial publication exploring Linux’s impact on modern society and technology.

We believe that understanding how Linux shapes government, education, business, personal computing, and open source communities is essential for anyone interested in technology’s future.

Our articles are written with depth and care, exploring not just the technical details but the human and organizational dimensions of Linux adoption and use.

We’re committed to independent, thoughtful journalism about technology that matters.
